name: Pir-Crew
description:
Coding by Ian https://yngar.itch.io/

A spin-off of Trash Poker https://yngar.itch.io/trash-poker

to save your creation take a screenshot! crop it and post it online! point your phone at the screen and get it that way, you're a pirate make your own way!

if you'd like to see a customization option, drop me 15 bucks on ko-fi with your request and ill add it to the customizer (barring unreasonable requests, of course :p)

https://ko-fi.com/T6T3EC4Z
